original_text: Again, the Lord said to him, “Put your hand inside your cloak.” And he put his hand inside his cloak, and when he took it out, behold, his hand was leprous like snow.
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 그에게 이르시되 네 손을 품에 넣으라 하시매 그가 손을 품에 넣었다가 내어보니 그의 손에 나병이 생겨 눈 같이 된지라

sentences.original_text: Again, the Lord said to him,

sentences.korean_translation: 네 손을 네 겉옷 속에 넣으라.

sentences.original_text: And he put his hand inside his cloak,
and when he took it out,
behold, his hand was leprous like snow.
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 그의 손이 눈처럼 문둥병에 걸렸더라.
